title: Slow cooker chickpea and potato soup with pesto
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 bay leaf', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '900g potatoes, cubed', '2L vegetable stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '8 tablespoons ready made pesto', '8 tablespoons soured cream or creme fraiche']
